configuration.name: Apache Directory 0.92 for Geronimo
configuration.description:
This plugin integrates the Apache Directory Server (ApacheDS) LDAP server with Geronimo. That means that Geronimo will run an embedded LDAP server when it starts. This LDAP server may be used for LDAP security realms within Geronimo, as well as for other purposes by Geronimo applications or by remote applications.
This plugin does not presently include any tools for managing or inspecting the LDAP server, though Geronimo itself includes a security realm that works with LDAP.
For more information on the ApacheDS project, see http://directory.apache.org/subprojects/apacheds/index.html
